channel.title: Ppsapis on NTP: Network Time Protocol

item.title: Available implementations of Pulse Per Second (PPS) API
item.description: This document lists known publicly-available implementations of the Pulse Per Second (PPS) API described in RFC 2783. This page was last updated 18 October 1999 at 15:03 by Jeff Mogul. NetBSD Linux FreeBSD NetBSD A prototype implementation for NetBSD, based on an earlier draft of this specification, using the com serial driver for NS8250, NS16450, and NS16650 UARTS is available in NetBSD-current. Note: This implementation currently corresponds to an earlier version of the API specification, and should NOT be used in production environments.
